sentence.Network_en: His son was praised for speeches of remarkable fluency.
sentence.Network_cn: 他儿子因为发言流畅自然而得到了表扬。

sentence.Network_en: Fluency in French is required for this job.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个工作要求法语熟练自如。

sentence.Network_en: More practice will make you speak with greater fluency.
sentence.Network_cn: 多练习就可以使你的口语更流利.

流畅性（fluency）：在短时间内能连续地表达出的观念和设想的数量；灵活性（flexibility）：能从不同角度、不同方向灵活地思考问题…
具体而言，考官将会在流利程度(fluency)、语法(grammar)、词汇 (vocabulary)和语音(pronunciation)四个方面对考生进行评估，四项 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin fluentia, from fluere 'to flow'

entry.def: Someone who is fluent in a particular language can speak the language easily and correctly. You can also say that someone speaks fluent French, Chinese, or some other language.

example.ex: She studied eight foreign languages but is fluent in only six of them...
example.tran: 她学习了8种外语，但是只能流利地说其中 6 种。

entry.tran: (语言或文字)流畅的，熟练的;文笔好的
entry.def: If your speech, reading, or writing is fluent, you speak, read, or write easily, smoothly, and clearly with no mistakes.

example.ex: He had emerged from being a hesitant and unsure candidate into a fluent debater.
example.tran: 他从一个吞吞吐吐、缺乏自信的候选人成长为口若悬河的辩论者。

means.word_mean: 3. the quality of being facile in speech and writing

auth_sentence.content: The fluency of his double-bass drum work is unrivalled.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fluency of his double-bass drum work is unrivalled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fluency of his double-bass drum work is unrivalled.

auth_sentence.content: His fluency stayed with him as his abilities flowered.
auth_sentence.res_content: His fluency stayed with him as his abilities flowered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His fluency stayed with him as his abilities flowered.

auth_sentence.content: Fluency in written and spoken English is a requirement.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fluency in written and spoken English is a requirement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fluency in written and spoken English is a requirement.

sentences.en: Fluency in spoken English is essential.
sentences.cn: 能讲一口流利的英语很重要。

sentences.en: More practice will make you speak with greater fluency.
sentences.cn: 多练习就可以使你的口语更流利。

sentences.en: Some young children achieve great fluency in their reading.
sentences.cn: 一些孩子小小年纪阅读已经非常流畅。

sentences.en: Though lacking in fluency,he spoke to the point.
sentences.cn: 他说得不流利但能切中要害。
